summary: This document is an email chain from October 2021, forwarding earlier 2018 emails regarding IP address submittals for equipment at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The correspondence involves a program manager from a federal contractor and a communication technician at the MCC, discussing technical requirements for programming an AMS server.

persons.name: Justin Houston
persons.context: Program Manager for SigNet Technologies/Convergint Federal Solutions, corresponding about IP address requirements for equipment at MCC New York.

persons.name: H. Daniel
persons.context: Communication Technician at MCC New York, inquiring about the number of ports needed with IP addresses for the submittals.

connections.description: Correspondence regarding technical IP address submittals for equipment at MCC New York, indicating a contractor-client or service provider relationship.

events.title: IP Submittals Inquiry
events.description: Email exchange between Justin Houston and H. Daniel regarding the number of IP addresses and ports needed for equipment at MCC New York to program an AMS server.

events.title: Email Forwarding of 2018 Correspondence
events.description: Justin Houston forwards the 2018 email chain about IP submittals, possibly for record-keeping or further action.

locations: MCC New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007-1704
12300 Kiln Ct Suite E, Beltsville, MD 20705
keyFacts: The document is an email chain discussing technical IP address requirements for equipment at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
Justin Houston, a program manager for a federal contractor (SigNet Technologies/Convergint Federal), is coordinating with H. Daniel, a communication technician at MCC New York.
The correspondence is from 2018 but was forwarded in 2021, indicating ongoing or revisited technical setup needs.
The purpose is to facilitate programming of an AMS server at the correctional facility.
No direct mention of Jeffrey Epstein, his case, or related individuals is present in this document.
